website_summaries.verdict: Naturally magnetic, these hematite beads give you an attractive, sophisicated alternative to metal bracelets.
pros: Strong elastic strand of high-quality hematite beads
Hematite is naturally magnetic and believed to promote wellness
cons: May run slightly small, so if you're not sure, size up

customer_reviews.title: NOT hematite. Please read.
customer_reviews.text: Not hematite!! Months later, I've learned a lot about crystals/stones and hematite is NOT magnetic nor can it be made to be magnetic. Yes, this is a magnetic bracelet and that might help you but please know that it is cannot be hematite. Google: "can hematite be magnetic" and read the results. This is some other stone/bead.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Belle

customer_reviews.title: Well-made bracelet that goes with everything
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is beautiful and attractive. After I e-mailed the seller asking about the authenticity of the stones, Believe London e-mailed me back confirming that the "hematite stones are natural but have magnetic elements added to them for blood circulation purposes." Their quick, straightforward reply has assuaged my initial concerns, and deepened my delight in owning and wearing this nice piece of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bracelet size 6 1/2” to wear with my watch on my left wrist. Didn’t stop to think that my watchband was magnetic at the time of purchase, so I put my bracelet on my right wrist, which is a little larger. The company emailed me to find out if I’m satisfied with the bracelet, which I am ( except for size). I explained my issue ( not their fault, but mine) and they offered to send me a new bracelet in the new size. This is a rare company that truly values their customers and I appreciate them going over and above what is expected.
customer_reviews.author: lovestoread

customer_reviews.title: Lovely magnetic hematite bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful magnetic hematite bracelet. It has sufficient weight and looks great on. The blue bead is a nice addition, although I wish it was another genuine gemstone (it appears to be a decorative bead). I haven’t been wearing it since it’s a gift, but it looks like it will hold up nicely and that the string is strong. Looking forward to seeing how it helps my moms arthritis once she starts wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really very pleased with my purchase. Originally I ordered two bracelets but gave one to my husband and the other to my grandson. They were so happy with their bracelets that I had to have one so I ordered a third bracelet. They were exactly as described on Amazon. They came with a card that described the properties of hermatite and a little jewelry bag to store your bracelet when it is not being worn. Now my son wants one. They are heavyweight and very pretty on the arm. If you have more than one bracelet on your arm they fit in very well. The price is excellent for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: vagma

customer_reviews.title: The bracelet arrived on time and was very pretty with the added blue stone
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet arrived on time and was very pretty with the added blue stone. I liked the fact that it came with a card telling what the healing traits of it were for. Also the pouch to keep it in. It was a gift and she was delighted! Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for pain and looks really nice on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend who was experiencing upper back pain from stress and work. He also had pain in lower back from working out in the gym and complained of his forearm hurting and I gave him this bracelet. It’s a very nice looking bracelet so he put it on immediately not really thinking it would help and a week later he thanked me again saying he thought it was helping. After that I didn see him for 3 weeks or so l and when I did he was still wearing the bracelet. I noticed it and made a comment about him wearing it, and he told me that he loves it and it really helped his pain.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Helped with headache
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bracelet. I purchased it because the reviews said it helped with headaches and balance etc.. I honestly was a little skeptical but wanted to give it a try . Glad I did. You see I started getting these headaches on a daily basis for whatever reason (weird) weather, pressure, allergies or maybe due to me accidentally bumping my head into the wall. May have giving my self a slight concussion. I purchased the bracelet along with the ear plugs “weathrX” and honestly they work. Not sure if it’s the bracelet alone or both together . So I believe now!!!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bracelet for its magnetic qualities to help alleviate wrist pain. I've been wearing this in conjunction with a Baltic Amber bracelet. Wasn't sure I was going to love the addition of the blue cats-eye bead, but I actually find it to be a nice touch! I order this in a 6.5" and it does not slide around. I could have gotten away with a 7". Great quality and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love & ordering my 3rd one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both bracelets in my pic from this seller but I'm reviewing the hematite closest to my hand. It's great looking. I'm so thankful that this seller offers 6.5 inch bracelets because as you can see my wrist is very petite and just because some bracelets are adjustable doesn't mean they won't fall off at their smallest length and they usually do. I also love the size of the beads because it's not too chunky and bulky. I've already ordered two bracelets from this company and I'm about to order my third so I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bracelete
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is very pretty and arrived promptly. I also like the one blue stone that is strung on - it adds some interest. My only complaint is that it's a bit tight. I don't have large wrists by any stretch of the imagination and I end up impressions on my wrist after wearing for only a couple of minutes. All-in-all a nice piece, I just wish it was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Crosscheck with your refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as hematite. As you can see in the photo I’ve shared, it is in fact magnetite. The photo is showing it sticking to my refrigerator. While magnetite has its own beneficial properties, I have an issue with it being advertised one thing, when it is something else entirely. I understand that they look very similar. But they are not the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked the bracelet, but it broke sadly
customer_reviews.text: I like the bracelet, but it doesn't seem to be magnetic? I've had magnetic hematite before and it would stick to everything metal. Other than that, its beautiful. I'm not sure if it has any benefits if its not magnetic though? Update: it was indeed magnetic, but it broke and beads went everywhere:-( They need to give it a stronger string because I didn't even yank on it.
customer_reviews.author: klynn954

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received this bracelet this week and am thrilled with the quality and look of it! I love that it comes with a card that describes how the hematite stones can be helpful for the body. I am so happy with my purchase, and have just ordered the chakra bracelet from the same seller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised by how it felt and looked
customer_reviews.text: This past Christmas, I gave my grandmother a bracelet of her birthstone. When I received the bracelet, I was pleasantly surprised by how it felt and looked. I was impressed and my grandmother was very impressed. So, I had to have one. And once again, I was not let down. My bracelet is beautiful. I love the weight. No doubt, it's the same quality as the first bracelet I purchased. I will be purchasing another one. I already have it waiting for me in my cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bracelets. One in the 7-inch size and the other in the expandable version for my mother (who has arthritis in her wrists). The quality of the hematite is gorgeous and I love the touch of the blue tiger's eye in the center. Both my mother and I have a lot of negativity flowing around us, so that was the main reason I purchased the hematite. There isn't a lot of stretch to my 7-inch bracelet but once I got it past the widest part of my knuckles it slid perfectly! It's very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cakes

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: After much research I decided on this particular magnetic Hematite bracelet. I'm glad I did. It's good quality & I noticed when I wear it, I feel more relaxed. My mother noticed this as well. However, my sister said it gave her energy. I've ordered 3 of these! Gave as gifts. I will be ordering another. Update 8/20: Just purchased 2 more. Very happy with the quality & effectiveness of these.
customer_reviews.author: LaShawn

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched customer support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product , and received it on time. This is really a quality product at a great price. I made a mistake and ordered a size to small. I contacted them to let them know what I had done , that I loved their product , and was going to buy a bigger size. I received a message back within a hour or 2. They are sending me a bigger size at no cost to me. It wasn’t their fault the size was wrong. This is a company that goes above and beyond when it comes to customer satisfaction and customer support. I highly recommend them and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony kisner

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL Bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bracelet! Not only is it beautiful to look at but, it's healing properties are unimaginable! Even a non-believer would benefit from its energy! I have felt so grounded and relaxed since I put it on. I am sleeping like a baby. I love that it is adjustable It is extremely well made. I HIGHLY recommend it! You cannot go wrong. Their customer service goes well beyond the call of duty. See my seller's review!
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bracelet. I got the 8inch
customer_reviews.text: I have extreme arthritis in my bilateral thumbs. I have used magnetic bracelets for 15 yrs, but never a natural stone bracelet. It works just as well. Beautiful bracelet. I got the 8inch, but the 7inch would have fit close to my wrist better. I had a volar plate and 5 screws put in my left wrist for a fracture 3 months ago, and it is still stiff. Hoping this might help with healing.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great product and can't wait to see the great benefits ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the bracelet for a few days but I can tell a difference! I'm a dispatcher for 911 and work in a constant high stress environment. I feel alot more calm and my anxiety is way down. Thanks for a great product and can't wait to see the great benefits with long time use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I was immediately impressed with this bracelet! After wearing it for only 4 hours, I felt marked relief! I was so excited I wanted to buy one for my husband but the size he needed in the style I wanted wasn't available. I ended up ordering for another company and was very disappointed that they didn't work at all and were just costume jewelry. This brand works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret T.

customer_reviews.title: Not real Hematite at all!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bracelet and cheap in cost but it’s not real Hematite. I brought this bracelet to try out thinking it was Hematite but it’s actually magnet. Anytime I walk pass or touch a metal object it clings to it. I felt no different health wise either. I ended up recently buying a real Hematite bracelet from Energy Muse and I love it! Moral of the story is research real crystals/stones and don’t buy just because it’s cheap and u get it faster with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Bracelets!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the hematite adjustable bracelet and loved it so much I bought the hematite and tourmaline adjustable bracelet two weeks later. They are really well made and priced so fairly I could buy two of them!! I wear them everyday and have gotten complements on them. I only take them off when I workout and take showers. They really are pretty. I actually bought another one to give as a gift. I’m very happy with these bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: swimmom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this bracelet I looked at a few others and decided on this one because it mentions the strength of the elastic, which is important. But the standout factor is the blue bead added. It just really sets the bracelet off and makes it unique. I actually was looking for hematite for an odd reason. to stop nightmares. I don't know if it works for that yet but I've not had one in a few days so that's promising.
customer_reviews.author: sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Helped w/ my “tennis elbow”.
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, and I feel that it is effective. I suffered from “tennis elbow”, so when I started wearing this bracelet, I noticed a reduction in pain. I wasn’t sure at first, but it was when I would NOT wear it, is when I noticed that it was working, because I had more pain when NOT wearing it...if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barker Wise

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bracelet with sturdy elastic!
customer_reviews.text: Because I didn't choose right size, bracelet was a bit loose. Instead of send it back, I was impatient and tried to adjust length myself. Plan was to cut elastic and removed 2 stones and retied. Retying to knot forced me to stretch cord so much that I was afraid of breaking BUT, it was strong for my clumsy fingers to manage making knot. I am impressed with beauty of power stones and strong material. Next time I won't be lazy to take measurement or impatient to return for right size instead of fixing myself (lesson learned).
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have found that 1) this is a very comfortable bracelet, 2) it fits just a little loosely, which I love, and 3) it has reduced the ongoing headache I always have from 7/8 on a pain scale of 10, to a 3/4. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Machspeed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: High quality! A very durable stone bracelet that is an eye catcher. I had to order two bracelets. The first order was a 6.5 and was very tight leaving marks on my wrist. I gave it away as a gift and ordered the 7 inch which fits perfectly. Update: 7/20 I lost my bracelet 😔 No worries though;I just ordered another one and it was here in 2 days. Energy is much better now. Love this bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Love this bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bracelet! It's very pretty and durable. It may just be a Simon's feather effect but I feel calmer with it on. I've never liked bracelets before but this is a mainstay for me now. So far as the size, my wrist is a little more than 7 inches and although the 7 is a little tight when it slips past my wrist bone, it is much preferable to the 8.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Guimond

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous product at a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bracelet and packaging is awesome! Shows care and pride in your business. I was delighted and wore it immediately. I purchased the hematite for it’s magnetic properties (Arthritis in both hands). I chose the adjustable one as I’m large boned. May take some time to rate pain relief but I do love it’s design & beauty. If it lessens my hand pain it’d be a perfect “10”!
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, hasn't been long enough to know about arthritic pain relief..
customer_reviews.text: I like my Believe bracelet this far.. I just received it 3 days ago, & put it on 2 days ago.... it looks nice... I believe it will take a few days, if not a couple weeks before I will be able to feel if the magnets are helping with my arthritis. I do believe it will help.. just haven't noticed a change yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute little everyday bracelet, don't think it's done a thing as far as it claims with anxiety or any other medical issues but never the less still cute. A little big but stays on, but I do have very small wrists
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stauch

customer_reviews.title: Should have got an 8 in instead I got a 7
customer_reviews.text: I got a 7 but I should have got an 8 otherwise it's beautiful and very pretty it's kind of heavy but that's okay what's up man I have to struggle to put it on and I'm really afraid of breaking it so when I get money again I guess I'll just buy it the 8
customer_reviews.author: Leia (lullaby)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and effective jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond satisfied with my beautiful magnetic hematite bracelet. I really needed one with strong elastic because I keep losing the ones with weak elastic. This one fits and wears comfortably, and is a beautiful jewelry piece. Highly recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Joy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 bracelets. They came quickly, beautifully packaged. I put them on immediately. I don,t know if they are helping yet. Its only been a few days. They are very pretty even if they do nothing. I am happy with the purchase and happy with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: librarywench

customer_reviews.title: Too small and disappointing that I can’t wear it
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering this I emailed you this company asking if this would fit a 9 inch wrist.. and I received back that it would fit my wrist. I received it today and it will not fit my wrist nor even come Close to going over my hand. I really wanted this bracelet. Is there away to get one that is bigger and has more beads so it can fit on my wrist because it’s outstanding quality. Or another one so I can combine the two. I’m super sad because I was excited for this because the company told me it would fit a 9 inch wrist and it won’t :( need help.
customer_reviews.author: Chania Nagel

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but maybe not for me
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely magnetic but I’m not convinced of the therapeutic aspects. I wanted computers to break less around me... and I wanted less hip and shoulder pain. None of that seems to be better. I do have a fancier looking wrist though. I got the one with the black tourmaline and hematite on an adjustable band. Seems sturdier than elastic but the extra length dangles on my wrist. Also it seems to loosen on its own which I don’t think I love.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because even though i measured and chose my size accordingly....its way too tight. Whatever size you think you need, get the next size up. Or the adjustable one. Im too lazy to return things so im keeping my too tight one and restringing it to fit. It IS beautiful and its, so far, helping my wrist pain.
customer_reviews.author: sara jo brown

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bracelet
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice looking and comfortable to wear. I'm not sure about the benefits of wearing magnets, but it doesn't hurt anything and I love how my bracelet looks. Hematite is an amazing stone. I also heard some of their profits go to charity :)
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again the blue bead sets it off
customer_reviews.text: Love it had it for two week so far so great could have done 7 instead 8 inch but not badly loose has a non snug fit ,only thing i dont like it the elastic is showing threw the beads where its tied at ,i wouldnt recomend bathing in it at all
customer_reviews.author: carlos velazquez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning, great quality and truly an amazing find. You never know by pictures but this bracelet is a Perfect gift for yourself and others. I bought 2, 1 for my BFF and One for myself and I would buy this again 100%
customer_reviews.author: REANNA

customer_reviews.title: Hematite Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bracelet. The beads are a nice quality, the elastic seems strong & it fits my wrist perfectly. As far as it helping with a bit of arthritis I have in my wrist, I don't know as I haven't had it long enough to determine that. But, shipping was quick, Company seems very professional & I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is beautiful I'm curious if it will help this person when she wears it. It has an adjustable band which is great since I dont know the size if her wrist. Even if it doesnt help it's nice to look at!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily go to bracelet. I love it so much. It fits with everything and because I have a small wrist it was hard to find a daily quality bracelet. Well, I found it with this one. I got exactly what I was looking for. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Perez

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the bracelet arrived and the jewelry bag it was placed in. I have worn not removed it since it arrived. It fits my small wrist perfectly and it has a tight stretch for larger wrists.l would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, i like the bracelet. I bought for its health benefits. Im thinking about getting one for my daughter since she gets frequent headaches. It's a little too early to tell whether or not it works since I've only worn it once--didnt get any headaches that day. The bracelet is good quality, magnetic, i really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color & Quality Stone
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bracelet's that I purchased, but the stones were small. I wanted them to be larger. I gifted one and kept one. If they can be purchased at a larger size, I would most definitely repurchase. If not, this was a one time purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: THIS bracelet does not fit, appears to be sized wrong. TOO BIG... stretched, elastic sting that holds it together is weak, like it will pop anytime. Replace it or resend in smaller size......... thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Aunt B

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Was to tight and small and I ordered a size 8 inch Very unhappy They are sending me a replacement bracelet I am forever grateful Thank you Believe in London Will update when bracelet comes Just got my replacement I am very happy fits perfectly Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Robin Brabham

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for him or her
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gift for that hard to buy for person. Includes a card explaining the calming powers of the stones and their history. Elastic bracelet. No fasteners to mess with. Not gender specific.
customer_reviews.author: M. Larocque

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but runs small
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little small for my wrist but it fits my daughter’s wrist. It nice quality but the elastic is super stiff. I was hoping it would have more give. We tested it with our EMF meter and it set it off when it was close.
customer_reviews.author: AZC

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Gift - She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who loves the healing properties of stones. So, when I gave her the bracelet in the bag it came in along with the card, she was incredibly excited! I selected the bracelet with the cat's eye and the overall bracelet was done beautifully. The bracelet was also a perfect fit, not too tight and not too loose. My only wish is that the card could actually fit in the bag so that the card does not precede the bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Reggi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bracelet, especially for the price. It feels very high quality. In the picture I have it paired with another one of my favorite bracelets (not from this seller). It’s the top one that I’m reviewing. I got the 6.5 inch and it’s a little snug but I prefer it that way. I plan on wearing this often.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until....
customer_reviews.text: I do believe this bracelet works but the metal ball at the end of the drawstring came off and the drawstring slipped out of the ring and now I cannot get it back in :(
customer_reviews.author: NyBabyMind

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and looks great. Get questions and compliments all the time
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 6 of these hematite bracelets, so it is safe to say that we love them. They are very well made and look great. As far as healing powers, I really don’t know one way or the other. However, with the spinal issues that I have, it can’t hurt. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Turn wrist black
customer_reviews.text: This is not hematite. It turned my daughter’s wrist black - real hematite won’t do that. The bracelet was purchased as a gift that i recently gave and is now beyond the return window. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this bracelet to my daughter to help her with her extreme stress & anxiety. Th bracelet is beautifully made and packaged. Time will tell whether the healing powers of the stone truly work.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the bracelet so far
customer_reviews.text: I like the bracelet so far, only had it for a few days. I haven't really felt any health benefits yet, but I have already got some compliments from people. I will probably order some more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is beautiful. Packaging was a nice presentation, a little drawstring bag with a card explaining the properties. The bracelet does fit a little tighter than I expected but it actually works out because then the colored bead stays right at the top of my wrist. Very pretty. I have worn it non stop since I received it and have no complaints. I would order again from Believe London.
customer_reviews.author: Shaney

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: i was pleased with the bracelets i ordered for my kids for Christmas. The quality exceeded my expectations.The items arrived on time for Christmas. I will be ordering more for myself.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: k.neal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I Love my Hematite Therapy Bracelet. My son introduced me to therapy bracelets and I am a fan. Any Therapy help that is natural is FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L DeCarlo

customer_reviews.title: Attractive hematite - very reasonable priced!
customer_reviews.text: There is something about this simple hematite bracelet that makes it an attractive wrist addition...I think it's the blue bead! The bracelet stacks well with other bracelets and the healing hematite is a bonus for sore wrists. Although it's not a cure it does feel good when I wear it. And, I would also like to add that this company is very pleasing to deal with:)
customer_reviews.author: Kadydog06

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bracelet, excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a very long time for a good, healing bracelet, I found this. I absolutely love it and it’s beautiful. I got the adjustable because I bartend and try to take it off when I’m washing a bunch of glasses. I’m not good with taking clasps on and off so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Norman

customer_reviews.title: Conversational pieces while contributing to your mental and physical health.  Therapy on the go!
customer_reviews.text: The product came fairly quickly and it looks great. The bracelets fits awesome. They are also conversation pieces also. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made
customer_reviews.text: I'll have to agree with the review majority that it's indeed a beautiful bracelet. I only just received and very excited to experience the results. I will provide a further update later on.
customer_reviews.author: JJ-VI

customer_reviews.title: very nice bracelet
customer_reviews.text: A well made and pretty bracelet. fits nice. Have to idea of any healing qualities as I haven't worn it a lot yet. But still a nice piece of jewelty.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Zay

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I work at a Folk Arts School, and I see many beautiful creations on a daily basis. I feel very satisfied with this hematite bracelet. The quality and the value together are really unbeatable. I will purchase more in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Love this product bought five
customer_reviews.text: Can you please make a 9. This is my fourth one. I gave two away. I want to wear one as an anklet the 8 fits over my foot but is tight around my ankle. I’d buy a 9 if you can make one. Plus this as an anklet you stretch over would be awesome
customer_reviews.author: Bgsldmt

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at these for a gift, had been having a horrible headache for about three days straight. Decided to order one for myself. I've been wearing it for few days and haven't had another headache. I'm not sure if I believe in all this but so far something has worked. It's beautiful as well. Worth the money if only for the beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing I suffer from blood issues and always so tired I just got it 2 days ago since I put it on it has helped me so much I feel so much more energy and great vibes I also have depression this has changed my life works for me Thanks so much!! I'm going to buy another one for my mom as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: JENNYJEN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking item and very stylish. Seems to hold up in the shower. Durability seems solid. Good item for her and him. Second review of this product because I ordered a few more. Very stylish, a good looking bracelet for him or her. Friends and family were interested and wanted one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: We hope to know that they will be beneficial to our health but we will surely enjoy wearing them no matter what💕
customer_reviews.text: We like that the sizes we ordered fit just right!! My wrist is very small and the 6:5 fit perfect and the same for my daughter!:) The 8 fit my husband good too!! Here’s hoping now that they will Benefit us Health Wise!!
customer_reviews.author: Charley Herring

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: These bracelets were/are beautiful and just as represented. I actually first ordered one for myself but when my daughter saw it she loved it and began wearing it so I ordered another for myself. Thank you for a wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: CResnick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and pretty, but for smaller wrists
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece, looks good and the blue bead is an eye catcher. I should have asked how big it is as this bracelet is very small in size. It was too small for the woman I bought it for. This is perfect for a smaller woman's wrist or teen. If a larger size is offered I would buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Twelves

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes the look of the bracelet though the jury is still out as far as the therapeutic properties. I'll have to come and revisit this later.
customer_reviews.author: John Park

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I wear this bracelet constantly. Its beautiful and very comfortable. I'm not sure that it is helping my health in any way but you never know.
customer_reviews.author: TresMilain

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift for a coworker. She has hand/wrist pain quite frequently. No word yet on if it takes away the pain but either way it is a lovely bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: kate smith

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I think it's very pretty. Nice beads and color. I hope it provides some relief to my arm that the bracelet is on.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Miritello

customer_reviews.title: Would make a perfect get well gift.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bracelet. The beads are beautiful and the bracelet is comfortable to wear, fits perfectly and would make a very nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne S

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful bracelet! The customer service is fantastic and the quality of the jewelry is amazing. Will most definitely be purchasing from this seller again!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: Fits my small wrists
customer_reviews.text: I have really small wrists. After emailing the seller I was told the adjustable bracelet would fit a six inches wrist. I just got it and it fits great. Beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: A very worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am a believer in magnet therapy...this bracelet is is very attractive....very stylish.....and feels good ..Thanks for a great produce....
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Bracelet More Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet came in a nice bag, with a card explaining the properties of it, which makes it very nice for gifting. The bracelet stretches to fit over your hand, but then fits just rights. It has a nice weight to it, too. This was not a gift, and I love it, but I would definitely gift to someone, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Believe or not
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it a week ago so I don't know it works or not for you, but for me it have worked, it reduces negative thoughts, feelings. Beside the bracelet looks nice. If something else happens I will tell later.
customer_reviews.author: Anhado

customer_reviews.title: HEMATITE CRYSTAL CHIP 8'  IS NOT MAGNETIC
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Believe London "Hematite Magnetic Therapy Bracelets". The slim hematite & tourmaline 8" is magnetic. THE HEMATITE CRYSTAL CHIP 8' IS NOT MAGNETIC. Although it is pretty, I am returning it because it is important for them to tell the truth!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DeniseNY

customer_reviews.title: Works to alleviate anxiety
customer_reviews.text: The piece is beautiful, well put together and I can already tell a difference in the decreasing of my anxiety. I recommend this to any and all!
customer_reviews.author: AtomicTangerine

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, lacks quality craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for Christmas but gifted for birthday in January instead. My son wore this once and found these stretchy, elastic strings dangling. Would be willing to exchange but Amazon says window is now closed. Disappointed, like the looks but it’s lacking in quality. Would of ordered additional for gifts, of quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Justine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color just like the picture, nice finish, a little small for mens hand but still fits. Very magnetic so you will be picking up metal objects lol. But hopefully it works.
customer_reviews.author: claudia vargas

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Love this since Im so allergic to the other copper kind. Took away all of my wrist pain within 5 or 10 mins. Wore it for a few weeks and now Im good as new. Will def wear again if my tendonitis flares up again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Crafted beautiful
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, outstanding magnetic bracelet , very beautiful and strong . My wife loved it, so I had to get her one als for her self and never takes it off .
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes I could play with the magnetic beads to distract me but the bracelet is too small to do that. I should have purchased the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Krazy4candi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it comes loose easily besides that its beautiful and inwear it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Received it on time....very nicely packaged ...cannot say if it works since have not worn long enough..very pretty looks like the picture
customer_reviews.author: caroline mayerhauser

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for large wrists but pinches.
customer_reviews.text: Bracelet was nice and large, and even loose on my large wrist which is what I was looking for but the tie off point was messy and kept scratching and pinching my wrist as I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Kyrial

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Masculine
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and overall appearance of the bracelet. I wish it came in an 8.5 inch elastic version. Still enjoying it though.
customer_reviews.author: Gervase

customer_reviews.title: Durable with great quality
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet Is amazing. It seems very durable and feels like the elastic will last long. For those considering this bracelet, make sure you measure your wrist to get the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: QP Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Love the bracelet but can’t wear it after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: The clasp that you pull the strings through has lost its grip in less than a month of wear and the bracelet keeps falling off of my arm!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: It is not magnetic. False description. Sad. I really needed magnetic bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was on time.
customer_reviews.text: I order the 6.5 sz and it fits perfectly. I normally wear a 7 in my bracelet. I'm glad I ordered the 6.5. Sometimes I don't know it's I'm wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Roberts

product_meta.title: Believe London Hematite Magnetic Therapy Bracelet with Jewelry Bag & Meaning Card | Strong Elastic | Precious Natural Stones Healing
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :March 30, 2018
 * Manufacturer :Believe London
 * ASIN :B07BR2PG81

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #31,225 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #97 inMen's Bracelets 
    *  #52 inWomen's Stretch Bracelets 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars847 ratings
feature_bullets: BELIEVE: Believe London created the “Hematite Bracelet” for its healing properties and its magnetic powers.
HIGHEST QUALITY: Natural genuine precious 8mm hematite stones - very strong elastic which means you can wear this bracelet every day and not worry about it breaking.

HEALING: Hematite is known to reduce stress, negative emotions and blood pressure disorders. Magnetic hematite is also known to regulate the blood flow in the body and help cure and relieve headaches and anaemia. Additional physical benefits include relief from cramps, spinal problems and fractured bones.

CHARITABLE: Believe London is a British brand that makes anyone believe anything is possible. We want to spread generosity and love by donating 5% of profits from these Hematite Bracelets to children in need.
125% GUARANTEE: Believe London provides a 125% Money Back Guarantee service. If you are not completely satisfied with our jewelry, simply return it with a 125% refund.
